accounts.name: hub
docs: Hub that this provider is registered under

errors.name: AlreadyEnrolled
errors.msg: Student already enrolled in this degree/course

fields.name: created
docs: Creation timestamp (used in PDA seeds: activity + provider + student + created)

fields.name: student
docs: Uploader / student wallet

fields.name: provider
docs: Provider account (PDA)

fields.name: course
docs: Course account (PDA) if activity is course-related

types.name: ActivityCreated
docs: Event emitted when an activity is created

types.name: ActivityGraded
docs: Event emitted when an activity is graded

fields.name: created
docs: Creation timestamp (also part of PDA seeds)

fields.name: updated
docs: Last update timestamp

fields.name: resource
docs: Associated resource PDA (Pubkey::default() if standalone)

fields.name: nostr_d_tag
docs: Optional Nostr "d" tag used to locate the latest editable content event

fields.name: nostr_author_pubkey
docs: Nostr author public key bytes (32 bytes). All-zero means "not set".

fields.name: walrus_blob_id
docs: Optional Walrus blob identifier for the asset file

fields.name: owner
docs: Wallet that created this asset and is allowed to update off-chain pointers

fields.name: creation_timestamp
docs: Creation timestamp used in PDA seeds (hub + provider + creation_timestamp)

fields.name: modules
docs: List of modules: each points to a resource (PDA) and has a percentage weight

fields.name: nostr_d_tag
docs: Optional Nostr "d" tag used to locate the latest editable course metadata event

fields.name: nostr_author_pubkey
docs: Nostr author public key bytes (32 bytes). All-zero means "not set".

fields.name: approved_credentials
docs: Credential PDAs approved by this provider for this course

types.name: CourseAccepted
docs: Event emitted when a course is accepted by hub

types.name: CourseCreated
docs: Event emitted when a course is created

types.name: CourseList
docs: Linked list node that stores an extended list of accepted course PDAs.

types.name: CourseModule
docs: One module in a course: points to a resource and its weight (percentage).

types.name: CourseRemovedFromHub
docs: Event emitted when a course is removed from hub

types.name: Credential
docs: Main credential data structure
Stores core information of academic credentials including participants, metadata and status

fields.name: created
docs: Creation timestamp

fields.name: updated
docs: Last update timestamp

fields.name: student_wallet
docs: Student wallet address

fields.name: mentor_wallet
docs: Mentor wallet address

fields.name: provider_wallet
docs: Educational provider wallet address

fields.name: nft_mint
docs: Associated NFT mint address

fields.name: course
docs: Course account (PDA) this credential belongs to  single canonical reference

fields.name: metadata
docs: Detailed credential metadata

fields.name: verification_count
docs: Verification count statistics

fields.name: status
docs: Current status

types.name: CredentialCreated
docs: Event emitted when a credential is created

types.name: CredentialEndorsed
docs: Event emitted when a credential is endorsed

types.name: CredentialMetadata
docs: Credential metadata structure

fields.name: title
docs: Credential title

fields.name: description
docs: Detailed description

fields.name: skills_acquired
docs: List of acquired skills

fields.name: research_output
docs: Research output (optional)

fields.name: mentor_endorsement
docs: Mentor endorsement content (set when mentor endorses)

fields.name: completion_date
docs: Completion date timestamp

fields.name: activities
docs: Activity PDAs created by this student and linked to this credential

types.name: CredentialMinted
docs: Event emitted when a credential NFT is minted

types.name: CredentialStatus
docs: Credential status enumeration
Tracks status changes throughout the credential's lifecycle

types.name: CredentialVerified
docs: Event emitted when a credential is verified

types.name: Hub
docs: Hub state account - acts as a curated registry.
Hub accepts Providers; Providers create Courses which Hub must accept to be usable.
Endorsers are set by each Provider and do not require Hub acceptance.

fields.name: authority
docs: Hub authority (can be multisig or DAO in future)

fields.name: accepted_providers
docs: List of accepted provider wallets

fields.name: accepted_courses
docs: List of accepted course PDAs (courses from accepted providers; must be accepted to be usable)
Entries can be direct course PDAs or CourseList PDAs for sharded storage.

fields.name: created_at
docs: Hub creation timestamp

fields.name: updated_at
docs: Last update timestamp

fields.name: config
docs: Hub configuration flags

types.name: HubAuthorityTransferred
docs: Event emitted when hub authority is transferred

types.name: HubConfig
docs: Hub configuration

fields.name: require_provider_approval
docs: Whether new providers need approval

fields.name: min_reputation_score
docs: Minimum reputation score for auto-acceptance

types.name: HubConfigUpdated
docs: Event emitted when hub config is updated

types.name: HubInitialized
docs: Event emitted when hub is initialized

types.name: Provider
docs: Educational provider state.
Provider creates Courses (Hub must accept them to be usable) and manages its own Endorsers (no Hub acceptance).

fields.name: wallet
docs: Provider wallet address

fields.name: name
docs: Organization name

fields.name: description
docs: Organization description

fields.name: website
docs: Website URL

fields.name: email
docs: Contact email

fields.name: provider_type
docs: Provider type (University, College, Institution, etc.)

fields.name: registered_at
docs: Registration timestamp

fields.name: endorsers
docs: Endorser wallets set by this provider (no Hub acceptance required)

types.name: ProviderAccepted
docs: Event emitted when a provider is accepted by hub

types.name: ProviderEndorserAdded
docs: Event emitted when a provider adds an endorser (provider-managed; no Hub acceptance)

types.name: ProviderEndorserRemoved
docs: Event emitted when a provider removes an endorser

types.name: ProviderRegistered
docs: Event emitted when a new provider is registered

types.name: ProviderRemovedFromHub
docs: Event emitted when a provider is removed from hub

types.name: ProviderUnsuspended
docs: Event emitted when a provider suspension is lifted

fields.name: created
docs: Creation timestamp (also part of PDA seeds)

fields.name: updated
docs: Last update timestamp

fields.name: external_id
docs: Optional external system identifier

fields.name: workload
docs: Estimated workload in minutes

fields.name: course
docs: Course account (PDA) this resource belongs to

fields.name: assets
docs: Attached asset PDAs

fields.name: tags
docs: Free-form tags for discovery/filtering

fields.name: nostr_d_tag
docs: Optional Nostr "d" tag used to locate the latest editable content event

fields.name: nostr_author_pubkey
docs: Nostr author public key bytes (32 bytes). All-zero means "not set".

fields.name: walrus_blob_id
docs: Optional Walrus blob identifier for the finalized content bundle

fields.name: owner
docs: Wallet that created this resource and is allowed to update off-chain pointers

types.name: ResourceAdded
docs: Event emitted when a resource is added

fields.name: submitted_at
docs: Submission timestamp (also part of PDA seeds)

fields.name: updated
docs: Last update timestamp

fields.name: resource
docs: Resource this submission is for

fields.name: student
docs: Student wallet

fields.name: assets
docs: Attached asset PDAs

fields.name: evidence_assets
docs: Evidence asset PDAs

fields.name: nostr_d_tag
docs: Optional Nostr "d" tag used to locate the latest editable content event

fields.name: nostr_author_pubkey
docs: Nostr author public key bytes (32 bytes). All-zero means "not set".

fields.name: walrus_blob_id
docs: Optional Walrus blob identifier for the submission content bundle
